name: Plum Nut
description:
Explore a holiday world in this Christmas game where the magic of The Nutcracker comes to life. Collect musical notes in time with the music of the Sugar Plum Fairy. Collect powerups and outfits as you run, leap and even fly in this unique take on the rhythm platformer and Rhythm Action game.

Universal App: Plum Nut is supported on iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPad 2 and newer models, iPad mini and 5th Generation iPod Touch
